CustomField.description: The Opportunity that triggered the creation of this case. The opportunity was Closed-Won and the customer contract was thereby renewed, but negative customer sentiment was observed during the renewal process.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Opportunity that triggered the creation of this case. The opportunity was Closed-Won and the customer contract was thereby renewed, but negative customer sentiment was observed during the renewal process.
CustomField.label: Current Renewal Opportunity
